Chinese.name: 单流音频录制
Chinese.description: 基于云函数+TRTC+COS+ffmpeg实现单流音频录制。可配合CFS实现长时间单流音频录制，并将生成的FLV音频文件转码MP3格式转储到指定的COS桶持久保存。
Chinese.attention: 模版函数需要配置函数URL触发器。

author.name: 腾讯云无服务器云函数团队

English.name: SingleAudioRecorder
English.description: This example demonstrates single-stream audio recording based on TRTC service, and push audio files to cos bucket.
English.attention: This example needs to configure the function url trigger.
